gate_6.title: The Conflict Trigger
gate_6.problem: You use emotional friction to feel connected to others.
gate_6.fix: Ask for attention directly instead of picking a fight.

gate_36.title: Emotional Chaos
gate_36.problem: You create drama when you feel stuck or bored.
gate_36.fix: Pause before reacting. Name your feeling out loud.

mars_aries.title: Quick to Act
mars_aries.problem: You jump into action before thinking it through.
mars_aries.fix: Count to five before responding in conflict.

projector.title: Needs Recognition
projector.problem: You get frustrated when you aren't invited to share your ideas.
projector.fix: Wait for someone to ask before giving advice.

split_definition.title: Feels Disconnected
split_definition.problem: You often feel like something is missing in relationships.
split_definition.fix: Tell others what you need instead of waiting for them to guess.

gene_key_6.title: Shadow of Conflict
gene_key_6.problem: You avoid or escalate arguments instead of resolving them.
gene_key_6.fix: State your needs calmly and listen before reacting.

triangle.title: Pulled Into Drama
triangle.problem: You get caught in the middle of other people's problems.
triangle.fix: Step back and let them resolve it themselves.

cutoff.title: Emotional Shutdown
cutoff.problem: You withdraw when things get tense.
cutoff.fix: Tell someone you need space, but will return to talk later.

abandonment_wound.title: Fear of Being Left
abandonment_wound.problem: You worry people will leave you, so you cling or push away.
abandonment_wound.fix: Remind yourself that needing space doesn't mean losing love.

needs_solitude.title: Needs Alone Time
needs_solitude.problem: You get overwhelmed if you don't recharge by yourself.
needs_solitude.fix: Schedule regular breaks to be alone, even for a few minutes.
